actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5, subchapter II, of title 5, United States Code, to provide for improved administrative procedures.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal executive and administrative agencies to establish agency appeal boards for review of decisions of presiding employees. States that, in the performance of their review functions, such employees shall not be responsible to or subject to the supervision or direction of any officer, employee, or agent engaged in the performance of investigative or prosecuting functions for any agency. Requires agencies to designate the officers authorized to sign and issue subpenas. Authorizes agencies to require by subpena any person to appear and testify or to appear and produce books, papers, documents, or tangible things, or both, at a hearing or deposition at any designated place.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5, subchapter II, of title 5, United States Code, to provide for improved administrative procedures.
